Entries.Maru_spouse: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}} keeps trying to talk to me, but all I want is a piece of this roast.
Entries.Maru: Whatever {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusName}} is roasting smells awfully good... *slurp*
Entries.Sebastian: One year {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}} put a pound of anchovies in the potluck soup.#$e#Ever wondered why {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}} leads the town in community service hours?$h
Entries.Penny: We do this festival every year to give the governor a taste of everything the valley has to offer.#$e#Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}} hopes it will get the governor on our good side. That's why {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisGender}}}}'s so neurotic about the way the soup tastes.
Entries.Harvey: Good thing I came with sunscreen.#$e#I wonder if {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}} could use some sunscreen on her shoulders?
